abstract: BHP Billiton may be seeking private-equity partners for a possible bid for Alcoa, which extended its unsolicited $28.6 billion offer for Alcan on Monday.
lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton may be seeking private-equity partners for a possible bid for Alcoa, which extended its unsolicited $28.6 billion offer for Alcan on Monday.

headline.main: Will Private Equity Step Into Steelmaker Standoff?
